SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.PRG_ID AS REF_ID , A.FUNC_ID , B.FUNC_NO , B.FUNC_NAME , A.PJT_ID , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT
FROM PJ_PRG_FUNC_MAP A , PJ_FUNCTION B
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PJT_ID = B.PJT_ID AND A.FUNC_ID = B.FUNC_ID AND A.PRG_ID = #{PRG_ID}
ORDER BY B.FUNC_NO, B.FUNC_ID
